messages.content: Angela Smith works with Lauren Alvarez.
Lauren Alvarez is a colleague of Jacqueline Martin.
Jacqueline Martin works with Denise Jones.
Denise Jones is a colleague of Anthony Tran.
Anthony Tran works with Patrick Martinez.
Patrick Martinez is a colleague of Catherine Hernandez.
Catherine Hernandez works with Julie Davis.
Julie Davis is a colleague of Roy Davis.
Roy Davis works with Anna Medina.
Anna Medina is a colleague of Harold Ramos.

queries.question: Are Angela Smith and Harold Ramos related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
